TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyEntry extends Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ChangeTracking.MemberEntry

summary.para: Provides access to change tracking information and operations for a given property.
Instances of this class are returned from methods when using the API and it is not designed to be directly constructed in your application code.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual object OriginalValue { get; set; }
.property instance object OriginalValue
Public Overridable Property OriginalValue As Object
member this.OriginalValue : obj with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the value that was assigned to this property when it was retrieved from the database. This property is populated when an entity is retrieved from the database, but setting it may be useful in disconnected scenarios where entities are retrieved with one context instance and saved with a different context instance.
